const stored=localStorage.getItem('streaksnap_habits');const habits=stored?JSON.parse(stored):[];setHasHabits(habits.length>0);setIsInitialized(true);};initialize();},[]);if(!isInitialized){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 to-orange-100 flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-16 h-16 mx-auto mb-4 bg-orange-500 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white text-2xl font-bold",children:"S"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-orange-600 font-medium",children:"Loading StreakSnap..."})]})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:hasHabits?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Onboarding,{onComplete:()=>setHasHabits(true)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/settings",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Settings,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/habit/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HabitDetails,{})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Toaster,{position:"top-center"})]});}export default App;
